She just came back home for a follow up visit with get oncologist. He said that her surgeon would like to see her in 6 months She says that the surgeon hasn't seen her since the surgery and she can't understand why he would need to see her a year and a half later. It will be a 12 hour drive. I have encouraged her to keep the appointment or at least call back to find out more about why he needs to see her. After all she's been through, I don't want her to miss anything she needs to do to stay well. Can anyone tell mr what the surgeon might be looking for so I can encourage her to go?
